Name: subdbid
column6: oid of the database which the subscription resides in

Name: subenabled
column6: if true, the subscription is enabled and should be replicating.

Name: subsynccommit
column6: contains the value of the synchronous_commit setting for the subscription workers.

Name: subconninfo
column6: connection string to the upstream database

Name: subslotname
column6: name of the replication slot in the upstream database (also used for the local replication origin name); null represents none

Name: subpublications
column6: array of subscribed publication names. these reference the publications on the publisher server. for more on publications see section 30.1.
